This is a starter blog post. Quarto supports math like $Q(s,a)$ and runnable code blocks.

```{python}
#| echo: true
#| warning: false
sum(i for i in range(5))
```

Add more posts by running:

```
quarto create post "my-next-post" --title "My next post"
```
